snippet: When you mishear a song lyric, you can go straight to the Internet to solve the mystery quickly. Or you can experience something altogether more enjoyable.
abstract: Willy Staley Riff essay, using the confusion that blossomed on the Internet over a lyric in a Rick Ross song, reflects on the unique pleasures of misunderstanding song lyrics, which has been blunted by the Internet.
lead_paragraph: When you mishear a song lyric, you can go straight to the Internet to solve the mystery quickly. Or you can experience something altogether more enjoyable.

headline.print_headline: What Is the Real Meaning of ‘Fanute’?
headline.main: Lady Mondegreen and the Miracle of Misheard Song Lyrics
